bike.description: D-6 Super Lite High Modulus carbon w/RIB (Reinforced I Beam) & Integrated T-T construction, IST (Integrated Seat Tube), Integrated cupped head tube, Double water bottle mounts.. Rear triangle: D-6 Super Lite High Modulus carbon stays with shaped ride tuned chainstay, cold forged dropout with replaceable hanger and CNC Disc mount only option

components.description: ROCKSHOX SID RLT Ti, 100mm Travel w PopLoc remote LockOut
FSA K-Force Light Compact 386 MegaExo w/Integrated spindle, 27/42T
Shimano XTR 980 GS Shadow Top normal 10sp
Shimano XTR 985-XCRace Centerlock Clincher Wheelset, 24H Tubeless
Shimano XTR 985 Hydraulic Disc, 180/160mm Centerlock rotor
Fuji 1 1/8" Press Fit Integrated, sealed bearing, 30mm spacers
